item.text: Therefore, if there is any encouragement in Christ, any comfort provided by love, any fellowship in the Spirit, any affection or mercy,

<st data-num="4137" class="">complete</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> and be of the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="5426" class="">mind</st>,<n id="1" /> by <st data-num="2192">having</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, being <st data-num="4861">united in spirit</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="5426" class="">having</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="5426" class="">purpose</st>.

Instead of being motivated <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2052" class="">selfish ambition</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2754" class="">vanity</st>, each of you should, in <st data-num="5012" class="">humility</st>, be <st data-num="2233" class="">moved to treat</st> <st data-num="240" class="">one another</st> as <st data-num="5242" class="">more important</st> than <st data-num="1438" class="">yourself</st>.

<st data-num="1538" class="">Each</st> of you should be <st data-num="4648" class="">concerned</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> only<n id="2" /> about <st data-num="1438" class="">your own</st> interests, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> about the interests of <st data-num="2087" class="">others</st> <st data-num="2532">as well</st>.<n id="3" />
You should have the same attitude toward one another that Christ Jesus had,

who, though he existed in the form of God,

did not regard equality with God

as something to be grasped,

but emptied himself

by taking on the form of a slave,

by looking like other men,

and by sharing in human nature.

He humbled himself

by becoming obedient to the point of death

—even death on a cross!

As a result God highly exalted him

and gave him the name

that is above every name,

so that at the name of Jesus

every knee will bow

—in heaven and on earth and under the earth—

and every tongue confess

that Jesus Christ is Lord

to the glory of God the Father.
So then, my dear friends, just as you have always obeyed, not only in my presence but even more in my absence, continue working out your salvation with awe and reverence,

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the one <st data-num="1754" class="">bringing forth</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> the <st data-num="2309" class="">desire</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1754" class="">effort</st>—<st data-num="5228" class="">for the sake of</st> his <st data-num="2107">good pleasure</st>—<st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="4160" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> <st data-num="1112" class="">grumbling</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1261" class="">arguing</st>,

<st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="273" class="">blameless</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="185" class="">pure</st>, <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="299">without blemish</st> though <st data-num="3319">you live in</st> a <st data-num="4646" class="">crooked</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1294" class="">perverse</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">society</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> you <st data-num="5316" class="">shine</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5458" class="">lights</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st><n id="1" />

by <st data-num="1907" class="">holding on</st> to<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> so that <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will have a reason to <st data-num="2745" class="">boast</st>: <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5143" class="">run</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2756" class="">vain</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="2872" class="">labor</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2756" class="">vain</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I am being <st data-num="4689" class="">poured out like a drink offering</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifice</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3009" class="">service</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, I am <st data-num="5463" class="">glad</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4796">rejoice together</st> with <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.
And in the same way you also should be glad and rejoice together with me.
Now I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you soon, so that I, too, may be encouraged by hearing news about you.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> there is <st data-num="3762">no one</st> here <st data-num="2473" class="">like</st> him <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> will <st data-num="1104" class="">readily</st> <st data-num="3309" class="">demonstrate</st> his <st data-num="3309">deep concern</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">Others</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">are busy with</st> <st data-num="1438">their own</st> concerns, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> those of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> you <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1382" class="">qualifications</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="5043" class="">son</st> working with his <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>, he <st data-num="1398" class="">served</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> in <st data-num="1519" class="">advancing</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> I <st data-num="1679" class="">hope</st> to <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="3778">him</st> <st data-num="1824">as soon as</st> I <st data-num="872" class="">know</st> more <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> situation,
though I am confident in the Lord that I, too, will be coming to see you soon.
But for now I have considered it necessary to send Epaphroditus to you. For he is my brother, coworker and fellow soldier, and your messenger and minister to me in my need.

<st data-num="1894" class="">Indeed</st>, he <st data-num="1971" class="">greatly missed</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="85" class="">distressed</st> <st data-num="1360" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he had been <st data-num="770" class="">ill</st>.

<st data-num="1063">In fact</st> he became so <st data-num="770" class="">ill</st> that he <st data-num="3897" class="">nearly</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">died</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1653">showed mercy</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>—<st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>—<st data-num="2443">so that</st> I would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">grief</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on top of</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">grief</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> I am all the <st data-num="4709">more eager</st> to <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> when you <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> you can <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2504" class="">and I</st> can <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="253">free from anxiety</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4327" class="">welcome</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1784" class="">honor</st> <st data-num="5108" class="">people like him</st>,
since it was because of the work of Christ that he almost died. He risked his life so that he could make up for your inability to serve me.
